00080 
00081     template<class RType>
00082     class Vector: public RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff /* and thus also public RDK2::Object */
00083     {
00084         protected:
00085             uint remoteIdx;
00086         
00087         public:
00088         string objsClassName;
00089 
00090         public: // FIXME it MUST be at least protected
00091         // DC: e perchï¿½ has-a e non is-a ?
00092         std::vector<RType*> c;
00093     
00094         Vector() : ObjectDiff("Vector"), remoteIdx(0) { RType rt; objsClassName = rt.getClassName(); }
00095         
00096         Vector& operator=(const Vector<RType>& c2) {
00097             return copy<RType>(c2);
00098         }
00099             
00100         template<class R2>
00101         Vector& copy(const Vector<R2>& c2) {
00102             clear();
00103             return append(c2);
00104         }
00105         
00106         template<class R2>
00107         Vector& append(const Vector<R2>& c2) {
00108             objsClassName = c2.objsClassName;
00109             for(typename Vector<R2>::const_iterator i=c2.begin();i!=c2.end();++i) {
00110                 const R2 * r2 = *i;
00111                 const RType * r1 = dynamic_cast<const RType*>(r2);
00112                 if(!r1) continue;
00113                 RDK2::Object * clone = r1->clone();
00114                 if(!clone) continue;
00115                 RType *clone2 = dynamic_cast<RType*>(clone);
00116                 if(!clone2) { delete clone; continue; }
00117                 push_back(clone2);
00118             }
00119             return *this;
00120         }
00121         
00122         RDK2::Object* clone() const {
00123             return new Vector<RType>(*this);
00124         }
00125 
00126         Vector(const Vector<RType>& c2) : 
00127             RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff("Vector"), remoteIdx(c2.remoteIdx)
00128         {
00129             copy<RType>(c2);
00130         }
00131         
00132         virtual ~Vector() {
00133             clear();
00134         }
00135     
00136         typedef typename std::vector<RType*>::iterator iterator;
00137         typedef typename std::vector<RType*>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00138         
00139         inline iterator begin() { return c.begin(); }
00140         inline const_iterator begin() const { return c.begin(); }
00141         inline iterator end() { return c.end(); }
00142         inline const_iterator end() const { return c.end(); }
00143 
00144         inline size_t size() const { return c.size(); }
00145         
00146         inline void resize(size_t n){ c.resize(n);}
00147         
00148         inline void reserve(size_t n){ c.reserve(n);}
00149 
00150         RType* operator[](uint i) const { return c[i]; }
00151         RType* getItem(uint i) const { return c[i]; }
00152 
00153         template<typename T>
00154         T* getItemAs(uint i) const { return dynamic_cast<T*>(c[i]); }   
00155     
00156         string getClassName() const { return objsClassName + "Vector"; }
00157 
00158         void push_back(RType*t) { c.push_back(t); }
00159     
00160         iterator erase(iterator it, bool alsoDelete) {
00161             RType* rt = *it;
00162             iterator retIt = c.erase(it);
00163             if (alsoDelete) delete rt;
00164             return retIt;
00165         }
00166 
00167         void clear(bool alsoDelete) {
00168             for (iterator it = c.begin(); it != c.end(); ) {
00169                 it = erase(it, alsoDelete);
00170             }
00171         }
00172     
00173         void clear() {
00174             for(iterator i=c.begin();i!=c.end();i++) {
00175                 RType * object = *i;
00176                 delete object;
00177             }
00178             c.clear();
00179         }
00180         
00181         virtual void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00182             uint vers = r->startReading(getClassName());
00183             int size = r->read_i32("size");
00184             if (vers >= 2) remoteIdx = r->read_i32("remoteIdx");
00185             else remoteIdx = 0;
00186             bool special = r->read_u8("special");
00187             if(special) {
00188                 string same = r->readString("class");
00189                 if(!supportedSpecial(same)) 
00190                     r->error( string("Unsupported special: ") + same);
00191 #ifndef SWIGRUBY                
00192                 if(same=="RString") {
00193                     for(int i=0;i<size;i++) {
00194                         string s = r->readString();
00195                         RDK2::RPrimitive::RString * rs = new RDK2::RPrimitive::RString(s);
00196                         
00197                         RType * r2 = dynamic_cast<RType*>(rs);
00198                         if(r2) {
00199                             c.push_back(r2);
00200                         } else {
00201                             delete rs;
00202                             r->error("Attempting to put RStrings into other container");
00203                         }
00204                     }
00205                 }
00206 #endif              
00207             } else {
00208                 //std::cout << "Reading " << size << " objects..." << std::endl;
00209                 for(int i=0;i<size;i++) {
00210                     Object * ob = (Object*) r->readObject();
00211                     RType * ob2 = dynamic_cast<RType*>(ob);
00212                     if(!ob2) r->error("Foreign object");
00213                     //std::cout << "read " << ob2->getStringRepresentation() << endl;
00214                     c.push_back(ob2);
00215                 }
00216                 
00217             }
00218             r->doneReading();
00219         }
00220         
00221         bool sameClass(string&cl) const {
00222             if(c.size()==0) return false;
00223             
00224             cl = c[0]->getClassName();
00225             for(int i=1;i<(int)c.size();i++)
00226                 if(c[i]->getClassName() != cl)
00227                     return false;
00228             
00229             return true;
00230         }
00231         
00232         bool supportedSpecial(cstr s) const {
00233             if(s=="RString") return true;
00234             return false;
00235         }
00236         
00237         virtual void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00238             w->startWriting(getClassName(), 2);
00239                 w->write_i32(c.size(), "size");
00240                 w->write_i32(remoteIdx, "remoteIdx");
00241 
00242                 string same;
00243                 if(sameClass(same) && supportedSpecial(same)) {
00244                     w->write_u8(true, "special");
00245                     w->writeString(same, "class");
00246 #ifndef SWIGRUBY
00247                     if(same=="RString") {
00248                         for(const_iterator i=c.begin();i!=c.end();++i) {
00249                             const RDK2::RPrimitive::RString * ob = 
00250                                 dynamic_cast<const RDK2::RPrimitive::RString*>(*i);
00251                             w->writeString(ob->value);
00252                         }
00253                     }
00254 #endif
00255                 } else {
00256                     w->write_u8(false, "special");
00257                     for(const_iterator i=c.begin();i!=c.end();++i) {
00258                         RType * ob = *i;
00259                         w->writeObject(true, ob);
00260                     }
00261                 }
00262             w->doneWriting();
00263         }
00264     
00265         virtual bool knowsDiffs() { return true; }
00266         
00267         // FIXME DC: penso che questa funzione non sia utile a nulla
00268         // ma per ora serve come interfaccia di ObjectDiff
00269         virtual vector<RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff*> split(size_t) {
00270             return vector<RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff*>(); }
00271         
00272         virtual bool applyDiff(const RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff* od) {
00273             const Vector<RType>* vd = dynamic_cast<const Vector<RType>*>(od);
00274             if (!vd) return false;
00275             else if (vd->remoteIdx < remoteIdx) return true;    // this diff is older than us
00276             else {
00277                 if (vd->remoteIdx > remoteIdx) {
00278                     remoteIdx = vd->remoteIdx;
00279 /*                  cout << "Arrived a remoteIdx "<<remoteIdx;
00280                     cout <<", I contained "<<size()<<"elements"<<endl;*/
00281                     clear(true);
00282                 }
00283                 for (size_t i = 0; i < vd->size(); i++) {
00284                     push_back((RType*) vd->operator[](i)->clone());
00285                 }
00286             }
00287             return true;
00288         }
00289         
00290         virtual vector<RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff*> splitInDiffs(size_t) {
00291             vector<RDK2::Meta::ObjectDiff*> ret;
00292             Vector<RType>* vd = new Vector<RType>;
00293             vd->remoteIdx = remoteIdx;
00294             for (size_t i = 0; i < c.size(); i++) {
00295                 vd->push_back((RType*) c[i]->clone());  // the object is cloned
00296                 if ((i % 30) == 0 || i == c.size()-1) { // FIXME
00297                     ret.push_back(vd);  // now the objects are not cloned
00298                     if (i != c.size()-1) {
00299                         vd = new Vector<RType>; vd->remoteIdx = remoteIdx;
00300                     }
00301                 }
00302             }
00303             remoteIdx++;
00304             return ret;
00305         }
00306     };
